synopsis:
Specials included on the DVD release of the Cofun Gal no Coffy Campus Life series.
NOTE FOR MODS: the DVD details on seller sites list at least 4 episodes but are ambiguous as to whether "and others" on disc 3 means another special. So I set the ep count to 5 because its twin Himitsukessha Taka no Tsume Countdown got 5 concrete specials on its DVD release and it would be an okay assumption to think "and others" is an extra special making Coffy mirror Tsume.

title.jp: Cofun Gal no Coffy Campus Life Specials
